name: War of The Worlds: Diaries
description:
"They have built tripods... They are attacking the Earth... Play out the lives of those who died saving us defeat the tripod invasion, and save our planet Earth.."

Take up your weapon and just start shooting in the action game war of the worlds: diaries... Ohh and there are some giant lasers and falling debris to warry about, but you should be fine.

CONTROLS:

A = left

D = right 

SPACE = jump

mouse = aim and shoot

 A game for the 2014 public domain jam
